snippet: Russian news accounts saw the cancellation, part of a United States plan to deploy additional ballistic missile interceptors to counter North Korea, as a potential breakthrough in a dispute.
abstract: United States has effectively canceled final phase of Europe-based missile defense system that was fiercely opposed by Russia and cited repeatedly by Kremlin as major obstacle to cooperation on nuclear arms reductions and other issues.

byline.original: By DAVID M. HERSZENHORN and MICHAEL R. GORDON
byline.contributor: David M. Herszenhorn reported from Moscow, and Michael R. Gordon from Washington. Thom Shanker contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Russian news accounts saw the cancellation, part of a United States plan to deploy additional ballistic missile interceptors to counter North Korea, as a potential breakthrough in a dispute.

headline.seo: U.S. Cancels Part of Missile Defense That Russia Opposed
headline.main: U.S. Cancels Part of Missile Defense That Russia Opposed
headline.print_headline: U.S. Cancels Last Phase of Missile Defense System That Russia Opposed

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
